description:
Ride your bike through increasingly tricky levels while pulling off daring stunts, huge combos, tests of accuracy and skill!

Featuring:
- STUNNING HAND CRAFTED LEVELS
Trail Boss BMX boasts 40 hand crafted, full 3D levels. Carve your own path to the finish line for ultimate creativity!

- 360 CHALLENGES
From trick challenges to score challenges, from target practice to scaring off the local wildlife - a wide variety of challenges will keep you coming back for more!

- BIKE CUSTOMISATION
Keep your bike as fresh as your skills with a custom paint job!

With a comprehensive tutorial, Trail Boss BMX is incredibly easy to learn, but has enough challenges to keep even the most extreme riders busy for hours on end. Letâ€™s do this!
name: Trail Boss BMX
